Package: org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.ghpages

[Groovy] Class GithubPagesPluginExtension

    • org.ajoberstar.gradle.git.ghpages.GithubPagesPluginExtension
    • All Implemented Interfaces and Traits:
      AuthenticationSupported

      class GithubPagesPluginExtension

      Extension for gh-pages specific properties.

      Since:
      0.1.0

      • Nested Class Summary

          Nested classes 
          Modifiers Name Description
          static class  GithubPagesPluginExtension.DestinationCopySpec

          Properties 
          Type Name and description
          java.lang.String  commitMessage

          PasswordCredentials  credentials

          Whether to delete existing files in the branch, replacing the entire contents.

          The distribution of files to put in gh-pages.

          The URI of the Github repository.
          java.lang.Object  targetBranch
          The branch of the Github repository to push to.
          java.lang.Object  workingPath
          The path to put the github repository in.

      • Inherited Methods Summary

          Inherited Methods 
          Methods inherited from class Name
          class java.lang.Object java.lang.Object#wait(), java.lang.Object#wait(long, int), java.lang.Object#wait(long), java.lang.Object#equals(java.lang.Object), java.lang.Object#toString(), java.lang.Object#hashCode(), java.lang.Object#getClass(), java.lang.Object#notify(), java.lang.Object#notifyAll()

      • Property Detail

        • java.lang.String commitMessage

          The message used when committing changes to Github pages branch. Defaults to 'Publish of Github pages from Gradle.'.

        • PasswordCredentials credentials

        • boolean deleteExistingFiles

          Whether to delete existing files in the branch, replacing the entire contents. Defaults to true.

        • final CopySpec pages

          The distribution of files to put in gh-pages. Defaults to including src/main/ghpages.

        • java.lang.Object repoUri

          The URI of the Github repository.

        • java.lang.Object targetBranch

          The branch of the Github repository to push to. Defaults to gh-pages

        • java.lang.Object workingPath

          The path to put the github repository in. Defaults to build/ghpages.

      • Constructor Detail

        • GithubPagesPluginExtension(Project project)

          Constructs the plugin extension.

          Parameters:
          project - the project to create the extension for

      • Method Detail

        • void credentials(groovy.lang.Closure closure)

          Configured the credentials to be used when interacting with the repo. This will be passed a PasswordCredentials instance.

          Parameters:
          closure - the configuration closure

        • java.lang.String getRepoUri()

          Gets the URI of the Github repository. This will be used to clone the repository.

          Returns:
          the repo URI

        • java.io.File getWorkingDir()

          Gets the working directory that the repo will be places in.

          Returns:
          the working directory

        • void pages(groovy.lang.Closure closure)

          Configures the gh-pages copy spec.

          Parameters:
          closure - the configuration closure
